name: Bikelancing
description:
Keep balance til the end and ride through the high ranks at the leaderboard!

A little QWOP-ish game using ASD / JKL to pedal and W / I to steer left and right.
(for any AZERTY layout user you can change in the settings pressing ESC)

• Credits • 
Musics from • Lud and Schlatts Musical Emporium.
Ambient Sound from • Beautiful Romanian forest (real ambient forest sounds) by Ultimate DIY.
Bike sounds from • Freesound.org
